original_text: Because of that, I weep for the vines of Sibmah, as Jazer weeps. I pour out my tears all over you, Heshbon and Elealeh. Your people no longer sing because they are happy at harvest time. There is no more fruit on your trees or crops in your fields.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 야셀의 울음처럼 십마의 포도나무를 위하여 울리라 헤스본이여, 엘르알레여, 내 눈물로 너를 적시리니 너의 여름 실과, 네 농작물에 즐거운 소리가 그쳤음이라

sentences.original_text: I weep for the vines of Sibmah
I pour out my tears all over you

sentences.korean_translation: 너희 백성들은 더 이상 노래하지 않다

sentences.original_text: because they are happy at harvest time
There is no more fruit on your trees
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 나무에는 더 이상 열매가 없다
